colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN PA BYED PA TSUL GSER CHOS SU GRAGS PA'I MAN NGAG ZHAL GDAMS 'DI NI, MKHRUGS NGOMS YAR 'PHEL SPRE BA CHOS RJE DGE LEGS RAB RGYAS LA YIG CHUNG DU GNANG BA LAS YI GER BKOD PA'O, ,ZHAL BUG PHYAG MTSA ME YE BSNYEN PA'I SKABS nA DU MI DU GSER CHOS ZAB MO 'DI YI GER BYED PO MU HRI SHRI STE, 'DI YI DGE BAS ZUNG MNGON 'GYUR SHOG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
